tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I know Dr. Sharad since my childhood as he’s my family dental doctor.
He has always been a gentlemen and has a keen knowledge of what and how to do. His observations and suggestions are always on point.
Staff working with him is very supportive and polite.
Highly recommended for people who are scared of dental treatment

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Sharad Gupta takes the time to listen to his patients and understands their concerns.
He looks for the underlying cause of  problems rather than just treating the symptoms.
He provides comprehensive treatment plans that address the root cause of the problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Sharad is an amazing doctor. I had a chip in my tooth which was fixed to my satisfaction through cosmetic dentistry.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr explained exact problem & treat it, which help me to take care future problem, which may arise due to negligence.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
CRUX - I decided to leave the treatment mid-way and it was the best decision I made. Later on I went to my old dentist *** *** ** ***** ** ** **** ********** *** **** ** ******* **** ** ******* 

I visited him considering him expert in tooth alignment. Right from the beginning he was more interested in his YouTube channel, ******* *** ************ showing videos and clips. Also, he was building long stories about the processes required for my problem. He tried to convince me that I must go through a long process to get myself treated ******* ******** ******* *** ** * **** ** ********* ******* I asked to apply a small resin temporarily so that I can eat properly. **** *** *** **** **** * **** ** **** **** ** *** *** **** ** *** **** *** ********** ** *** *** ** ***** ** my tooth and then started chipping it including some part of my tooth.  My upper tooth was trapped in the lower tooth ******* ** *** **** ***** ***** *** * ***** **** ****** ** ***** ***** ******** ***** ** ******** ** ******** *** ****** That's when I asked him to stop the treatment and left. ** **** **** ** **** * ******** still he charged for the full treatment including his consultation fee ****** **** ***** *********** He never bothered asking why I was leaving. 

Later on, I called my dentist *** *** *** **** ** ******* ***** ** ** ***** ** **** ********** ** **** ******* ** **** ********* ******** * ** *** ***** ***** why did I not talk to my dentist at the first place. 

****** ** ** ****** **** *** ******* ******* *** ****** *** ***** ***** **** ********** ** **** *** *** ** ********* *** ******* ** *****
reply_text:
Patient seeks specialist solution to his ongoing bite problem .All definitive possibilities discussed and references showed.Temporary filling is not your solution. Any filling or new crown when placed in mouth need some adjustments,if patient suddenly leaves in confusion its bound to feel high .
Best wishes always

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
My tooth was half gone with cavity and at an initial look transplant was suggested . Dr Sharad not only ensured reconstruction of tooth but also gave my tooth an extra strength that gives me my smile back . Thanks dr for your passion towards your work n treating patients with best of your abilities. 
Fortunate to have dr s like you .
